attributes.description:
Title: Roadmaps to Enlightenment Part 1 
Name Program: Shiva Sutras - Sastras
Session on: The difference and correlation between Shastras, Stotras and Tantra, and how to reach enlightenment by following these scriptures.
Date: 25 January 2005
Venue: Adikailaasa, Bengaluru, India|

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam explains the difference and correlation between Stotras, Shastras, and Tantra. He elaborates in-depth on each type of scripture, why they were developed, and how we can use them for our #enlightenment. HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam further explains what a Paramahamsa is â€“ a person who lives beyond subconscious and unconscious zones. How can we utilize the #scriptures as roadmaps for enlightenment so us, human beings, can experience this same zone consciously.
